title: Phylogenetic Tree
alt: And I was kicked out of my March Madness pool because I wouldn't shut up about the evidence for NBA/ABA endosymbiosis.
transcript:
[A circular phylogenetic tree is shown, with various parts of the tree colored red, green, blue, and black.][Caption below the panel:]
I was kicked off the biology project after I secretly replaced all the phylogenetic trees in our new paper with March Madness brackets.
